title: Options Premium Review (5 minutes)
subtitle: See if premium is rich or cheap vs history.
goal: Daily IV regime check with a simple recommendation.

steps.description: Evaluate options premium context (IV rank + term slope).
steps.rationale: High IV favors selling; low IV can favor buying if trend helps.

caveats: Regimes can flip quickly around events
beginner_summary: Check IV rank and term structure to decide if premium is rich or cheap.
